summary: After a baby monitor picks up another channel, Anna begins reliving the nightmare she'd recently escaped.
cast: Noomi Rapace|Kristoffer Joner|Vetle Qvenild Werring|Stig R. Amdam|Maria Bock|Torkil Høeg|Henrik Rafaelsen|Tom Hugo Nielsen|Mona Engh|Eva Zeidler|Kaia Varjord|Camilla Augusta Hallan|Haakon Gjerløw|Frank Jørstad|Bjørn Moan|Birgitte Nordby|Ursel Klepser|Nicole Spieler|Anette Bergman|Angelika Göhler|Alexander Burkhard|Henning Ranncher|Uwe Bacher|Anderz Eide|Leif Sørensen|Bendik Ø. title: Babycall
